# *build-assessments

**Purpose:** Create aligned assessments and rubrics.

## Steps
- Choose assessment types per outcome
- Author items/tasks with answer keys
- Create rubrics (analytic; observable criteria)
- Define feedback and retake policy

**Outputs**
- docs/assessments/{course_slug}/{lesson_id}-assessment.md
- docs/rubrics/{course_slug}/{lesson_id}-rubric.md
